title: Day 2 of Big Ten Media Days
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy and Sam Acho discuss how Ohio State's defense will look different under new defensive coordinator Jim Knowles. Plus, how can Penn State rebound from a rough finish to the 2021 season and how Michigan State can build on its success from last season. Ryan Day, Mel Tucker and Sean Clifford take the podium from Indianapolis. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew breaks down the action from Day 2 of Big Ten Media Days
